channel.title: Are there any Client / Servers that emulate RS2 perfectly?
channel.description:
I have no idea where to post this but I wanted to know. More precisely something without custom crap like most servers provide.
Like old Runescape 2 before the end of the old 317 client or the one at the end of the other ones where you can do everything you could do in Regular RS but without the newer content.
I'd really like to PK like the old days without the newer updates, like no GS or badly added D Claws. or any of that Crap.

item.title: Are there any Client / Servers that emulate RS2 perfectly?

item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“0mg Noob, post:8, topic:295478”]Mine is well on it’s way.
Project '05

:)[/quote]
I cant wait so i can leech it ill be all like

[quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=391480.msg2960556#msg2960556 date=1253151162]
“amfg i maded runzacspae!!! cum hon plz i own it n i mad it it tuk me a 100000000000 dayz.”

Read full topic

item.source: Are there any Client / Servers that emulate RS2 perfectly?

item.title: Are there any Client / Servers that emulate RS2 perfectly?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

tobias222:

Tbh, I’ve seen this attempted about 30 times in the past in all of my time here, and some (like 2/30) become quite good, but not exact, but in terms of autospawn and shops they may be virtually perfect, they never get released because the developers have worked too hard on them and don’t want people “leeching” their source. Its like saying If you have the determination to sit at the computer for hundreds and hundreds of hours to do a rs2 emulator please release your work after rofl.

That’s exactly the thing, we don’t want to sit at our computers for hundreds of hours only to release our work so some noob can spend a few seconds posting our pictures and client, then typing:

“amfg i maded runzacspae!!! cum hon plz i own it n i mad it it tuk me a 100000000000 dayz.”

Do you now understand why we refuse to release?

Read full topic
item.source: Are there any Client / Servers that emulate RS2 perfectly?

item.title: Are there any Client / Servers that emulate RS2 perfectly?
item.dc:creator: @stability666 stability666
item.description:
@stability666 wrote:

My server is lieyk old 2004 runescape. Those were the times. That’s why i’ve been programming for the past three months, working on “Project Eclypse” and yes I know it’s spelt eclipse. lawlers. It’s going to be exactly lieyk runescape… as IIII remember it, it probably won’t have EVERYTHING… But everything that I remember.

Read full topic
